É Half-Life 2. Não tem erro!
FPS de 2004 que envelheceu super bem, divertido e ainda possui suporte a mods com uma comunidade ativa e dedicada. Compra essêncial!

และตอนนี้เราก็ซื์อตอนต่อไปมาเล่นต่อเนื่องแล้วด้วย เกมนี้ทำให้ไม่ผิดหวังเลย
และเป็นอะไรที่เยี่ยมมากๆ ถ้าได้ลงมอดจำพวกภาพสวย หรือมอดที่ทำให้เกมสมจริงขึ้น

Познакомимся с этой игрой лет так 5 назад. Тогда она очень впечатлила свой графикой и физикой 2003 года. Даже не думал что игре уже 18 лет. Если вас ломает настольди. То советую эту игру от всего своего гребного сердца

ES HALF LIFE TIENES QE JUGARLO

Llego unos cuantos años tarde pero sí, este juego se merece su fama.

When I was a kid, this game gave me a furor. The very atmosphere of the murdered future, the plot, the intricately woven universe of the game. If you don't pick on the graphics, the game still looks pleasing to the eye. But I think it's the kind of graphics that emphasize the atmosphere of the game.
This game is old but gold. At the time it was reliesed, it was so good and still is. (:

Not only love this title but it is an inspiration for me, in designing things in general. In my opinion its still ahead of its time. Also it is an example of respecting players by delivering real quality, designed from A to Z, and then again to make sure experience is genuine and fresh.

First time I played this and the very last; cuz this has to be the most overrated game that has been ever released. I won't waste all my day explaining; but if I can describe it in a word it would be TEDIOUS; and I say this without having the last few chapters blind my opinion of the game. The characters and their story is as great as everyone says and probably what kept me playing until I reached the last chapters. 

IMPORTANT NOTE : This review is NOT my opinion of the Episodes cuz they are the best thing ever and I would never dare to disrespect them.

The daily maintenance and responsibilities to craft this fleshy vessel you don't see in front of you was strained when i just wanted to continue playing this game.

Everything about this game kept  me going. Particularly, the physics engine is so fun and satisfying and i jibed with the 
well-crafted linear progression.

I did get softlocked once and the g-man was just standing aimlessly as i walked past. Still has still has some hiccups.
